body_html:
@hitvoice
Dude,I try your whl file 'tensorflow-1.7.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl' just now but I still get a wrong message: "libcublas.so.9.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory".And I have no idea.
I built a same whl before and the build process is right and then I got a same problem.So I tried yours.But it still doesn't work.Maybe some configuration in my system doesn't fit?

My environment:

  • Cuda compilation tools, release 9.1, V9.1.85
  • cudnn:7.1.2
  • nvidia-driver:390.48
  • card:1080ti
  • ubuntu:16.04

Thanks again~

body:
@hitvoice 
Dude,I try your whl file 'tensorflow-1.7.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl' just now but I still get a wrong message: "libcublas.so.9.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory".And I have no idea.
I built a same whl before and the build process is right and then I got a same problem.So I tried yours.But it still doesn't work.Maybe some configuration in my system doesn't fit?

My environment:
- Cuda compilation tools, release 9.1, V9.1.85
- cudnn:7.1.2
- nvidia-driver:390.48
- card:1080ti
- ubuntu:16.04

Thanks again~
